source.62cb66f4:
import rx
from rx import of,operators as op
source.5781a58a:
DATA.pipe(
   op.start_with(100,200,300)
).subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x: print("The value is {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e:print("error = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda : print("completed")
)
source.f5a6b05d:
# start_with

will take in the given values, 

and add at the start of the source observable 

return back the full sequence.
